traffic_visible_response: 正在搜索找到 4 篇资料参考In 2020, a major fire accident occurred at Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing on September 27. Here are the details:- **Accident Process**: At 0:20 on September 27, 2020, the No. 2 large - inclination belt for coal transportation in the underground of Songzao Coal Mine of Chongqing Energy Investment Yuxin Energy Company caught fire. The coal gangue accumulated under the belt, and the return idler at the - 63.3 - meter elevation was stuck and worn through to form a hole, with powdered coal deposited inside. The severely worn belt rubbed against the return idler at the ignition point, generating high temperature and sparks, which ignited the powdered coal accumulated in the hole of the return idler. After the emergency shutdown, the static belt was ignited. The unqualified fire - retardant performance of the belt, the large inclination of the roadway, and the upward ventilation enhanced the fire, causing the belt and coal to burn together. The fire burned equipment, damaged ventilation facilities, and the toxic, harmful, and high - temperature smoke quickly spread to the 2324 - 1 coal - mining face, resulting in a major casualty accident.- **Casualties**: The accident caused 16 deaths and 42 injuries, with a direct economic loss of 25.01 million yuan.- **Accident Disposal**: After the accident, the emergency, medical, public security, fire protection, and other departments in Chongqing and Qijiang District carried out rescue and disposal work at the scene. On September 29, 2020, a special video conference on coal mine safety production was held, and the preliminary investigation results of the accident were reported. On October 16, 2020, the Office of the State Council Safety Committee interviewed the main persons in charge of the Chongqing Energy Investment Group Co., Ltd., Chongqing Energy Investment Yuxin Energy Co., Ltd., and Songzao Coal Mine. On March 26, 2021, 37 public officials involved in the accident were seriously held accountable.
